alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 29 at 3:16AM EST until December 29 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...The northern Adirondacks in New York, Rutland, Windsor and Orange counties in Vermont. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Multiple remote sensors and observations from area web cameras show that there are areas of dense fog occurring on the north side of a quasi-stationary front. Visibility has been less than 1/8 of a mile at times resulting in hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Orange; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
